channel.title: Park anywhere for free
channel.description:
if you've ever gone to park your car and found out that theres no spaces, this is for you :D
you print off 3 white pieces of paper with "TRAFFIC SURVEY VEHICLE" typed on them (black, times new roman, one word per line) and put one in front of the windscreen, and the other two in the rear passenger windows.
thus, you can park anywhere for free

item.title: Park anywhere for free
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

That’s not going to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Park anywhere for free
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Police officers will most likely run the liscense plate number before they even look at the vehicle, and once they get a reply, they’ll know if it’s a goverment vehicle, and they’ll probably send you to jail for impersonating a goverment official.

Read full topic
